word_mean: 淀粉酶：可催化淀粉水解成更小分子的酶。动物体内为α-淀粉酶，包括唾液淀粉酶和胰淀粉酶。高等植物中为β-淀粉酶。α-淀粉酶以随机方式促使多糖类的α-1，4-葡聚糖链之水解

sentence.Network_en: The blood amylase is usually elevated as a result of parotitis.

sentence.Network_en: The starch - digesting amylase produced by the pancreas and present in pancreatic juice.
sentence.Network_cn: 小肠内产生的助消化的荷尔蒙;刺激胰腺和肝脏.

means.word_mean: 1. any of a group of proteins found in saliva and pancreatic juice and parts of plants; help convert starch to sugar
